Posted By: Zach Rice
I am taking offers for the below card. This T211 is one of the nicest ones that I have seen, it has a beautiful red back and minimal chipping. The only thing down grading this card is minor corner rounding, a small mark at the card's top and a wrinkle on the bottom left side (only really visiable when tilted in light). I will be out till later this evening but feel free to email me, I will respond to each email or post on the board. 

Best Regards,

Zach Rice
Zacharyrice@sbcglobal.net
